ing: 1 (7.2 ounce) package Snack FactoryÂ® Bacon Habanero Pretzel CrispsÂ®
Sweet chili sauce as needed for topping
des: "Snack FactoryÂ® Pretzel CrispsÂ® are topped with a creamy habanero cheese mixture and slices or sweet pepper, broiled, and finished with sweet chili sauce and another Pretzel CrispsÂ®."
ins:
Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.
Combine the whipped cream cheese and shredded habanero cheese. Place a dollop on each Snack Factory(R) Pretzel Crisps(R). Top with a few slices of bell pepper.
Melt slightly under broiler or in a toaster oven. Top each with sweet chili sauce and another Pretzel Crisps(R).
